The study states that for three soil fertility parameters (available Ca, Fe, and TEB), the prediction models produced reasonable performance with an R2 greater than 0.50. Output:

1. Data Collection: The study collected data on physiographic, agro-climatic, soil parent-material, and physicochemical attributes such as pH, electrical conductivity (EC), loss on ignition organic matter, and organic carbon. PXRF was used to measure the elemental composition of the soil.
